## ğŸ“Š **Points System**

| Action            | Points | Maximum |
| ----------------- | ------ | ------- |
| Star repository   | 10     | 10      |
| Fork repository   | 5      | 5       |
| Open issue        | 5      | 50      |
| Close issue       | 10     | 100     |
| Submit PR         | 25     | 250     |
| PR merged         | 50     | 500     |
| Documentation     | 15     | 150     |
| Bug report        | 20     | 200     |
| Feature request   | 15     | 150     |
| Community help    | 5      | 100     |
| Performance test  | 30     | 300     |
| Security research | 40     | 400     |
